GSP29vnyps32u:2: nyā. pa. śa. 20 atha pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyavibhāga evānupapannaḥ, sarvasyāpi vākyasya pauruṣeyatve vākyatvādiliṅgasadbhāvāt---sarvajñapraṇītā vedāḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:3: vedatvāt, iti vyatirekisaṃbhavāt; “mantrakṛdbhyaḥ” “tasya ha vā etasya
GSP29vnyps32u:6: yajustasmādajāyata” ityādiśravaṇāt, “pratimanvantaraṃ caiṣā śrutiranyā vidhīyate” ityādismṛteśca;”adhikṛtya kṛte granthe” iti
GSP29vnyps32u:10: iti cet, tanna, vākyatvānumānasya vipakṣe bādhakābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:13: kramaviśeṣeṇānuccāryamāṇānāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ padatvaṃ vākyatvaṃ veti
GSP29vnyps32u:15: ādimamuccāraṇaṃ kartrabhāve kathaṃ syāditi cenna, ādimattvasyaivāsiddheḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:18: apauruṣeyatve ghuṇakṣatākṣaravadūbodhakatvepyabhiprāyavirahādarthaparatvaṃ na syāditi cenna, pratipanne nirbādhe cārthe pradhāne bodhakatvasyaiva tātparyarūpatvāt, prādhānyāderlaukikavākyavadākhyātādisvabhāvādeva
GSP29vnyps32u:21: tathā bhāṣyam--- “svaśāsanāvabodhi śāstramiti nityaṃ śrutyaiva niyuṅkte
GSP29vnyps32u:31: bāhyāgamaparigrahavat kiṃ nasyāt ? iti cenna, bahujanaparigrahādimātrasya
GSP29vnyps32u:33: tayoḥ ko vā viśeṣaḥ ? iti cenna, hetudarśanādarśanābhyāṃ viśeṣāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:35: tatparigrahaḥ, iha tu na tathā, tadvaiparītyasya suprasiddhatvāt, iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:36: nyā. pa. śa. 21 api ca bāhyāgamapratibandiḥ kiṃ vadeprāmāṇyamāptaprāmāṇyanibandhanamitīcchadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirucyate
GSP29vnyps32u:43: ata eva na tṛtīyaḥ, prāmāṇyasya parokṣaprāmāṇyasya vākyaprāmāṇyasya ca sthāpitatvena vaidikavākye hyautsargike prāmāṇye prāpte
GSP29vnyps32u:46: nyā. pa. śa. 22 ata eva hi prekṣāvantaraścoditeṣu bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhyeṣu niśaṅkaṃ pravartante, pratiṣiddheṣu ca sukhatareṣvapi viṣasaṃsṛṣṭānnabhojanādivannivartante /
GSP29vnyps32u:52: ataduddeśena teṣāṃ pravṛttidarśanāt, taduddeśena pravṛtteśca ḍāmbhikatvena
GSP29vnyps32u:54: ye ca taduddeśena pravartante, tepyataduddeśena pravṛttānāmanukurvāṇā eva
GSP29vnyps32u:56: na hi yatkiñcidanena kṛtamiti matvā kaścit kṛcchrasaṃpāditān dhanādīn dadāti, pūjayati, guṇānvā āropya stauti; api tu kutaścit pramāṇāt siddhaṃ praśastācaraṇamabhimatyaiva /
GSP29vnyps32u:59: janarañjanārthameva dānādi, jano dātari mānayitari ca rajyate,
GSP29vnyps32u:64: kiṃ te svātmānamapi pratārayanti? ye nāma samastabhogāvimukhā
GSP29vnyps32u:65: yāvajjīvamātmānaṃ parikleśayanti; yaiśca paṭuprajñāḥ sarve lokāḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:66: pratāritāḥ, te kathaṃ lokottaraprajñena tvayā pratārakā ityunnītāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:68: pramāṇasvarūpaphalayorabādhasya ca pratyakṣatvāt dharmabuddhyaiva ca nirupādhikaparigrahasya tvaduktyaiva siddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:69: anādinidhanesminnāmnāyamūle anuṣṭhāne pravahati prakriyāntaramāśritya pratārakairīśvarairarvācīnaiśca praticchandapravartanā śrutismṛtisiddhā yuktimatī cetyeṣā dik //
GSP29vnyps32u:76: aprāmāṇyamicchatopi mahājanaparigrahānyathānupapattyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhya tata eva tatsādhanāt
GSP29vnyps32u:77: na cāsti vedapravartanasya sārasvatapāṭhenānaikāntyam, tathaiva tatpravāhasya tattacchākhāpraṇayanavadanāditvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:79: evaṃvipakṣe bādhakābhāvādeva kevalavyatirekyapi nirastaḥ, anumānādhyāye tasya sāmānyato dūṣitatvācca
GSP29vnyps32u:80: tvanmatepyāyurvedādisapakṣasadbhāvena tasyāsādhāraṇyam; nahi tebhyo vyāvṛttamapauruṣeyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ vedatvaṃ tvayābhyupagamyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:81: vedaśabdaprayogaviṣayatāmātreṇa teṣāmapi pakṣīkāre svecchāgṛhītarūpasyeśvarasya tattadavatārasaṃvyavahārā vedavyatiriktāḥ santi sapakṣāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:82: na ca te tvayāpi neṣyante, vedatayā vā svīkriyante, gītādiṣu bhagavaduktyaṃśānāṃ śrīviṣṇusmṛtiprabhṛtīnāṃ ca vedatvānabhyupagamāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:84: avaktṛkasandarbhā vedāḥ, vedatvāt, yaḥ sakartṛkasandarbhaḥ, nāsau vedaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:87: sandarbhaḥ kathamavavatṛkaḥ syāditi cenna, varṇakramaniyamamātraviśeṣasya sandarbhaśabdena grahaṇāt,tasya ca prāguktanayena yathāpūrvapravartanamātreṇāpi vyavasthānāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:89: vītastu syāt vigītaṃ vākyaṃ sarvajñapraṇītaṃ, pramāṇatve
GSP29vnyps32u:92: atīvakartṛkatve satīti viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ iti cenna, tathāpi yathāpūrvapraṇayanamātreṇāpi tatpraṇītatvasiddhau siddhasādhanāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:93: yathāpūrvameva hi viśvamīśvaraḥ sṛjati; yathā adhīmahe---
GSP29vnyps32u:96: cenna, yathāpūrvaṃ ghaṭādinirmāṇe kulālakuvindādeḥ kartṛtvasiddheḥ; hanta
GSP29vnyps32u:97: ! vedasya evaṃ syāditi cet, hanta ! syādeva /
GSP29vnyps32u:98: na hi kalpāntaravarṇavyaktisamudāyamevedānīntanavedarāśiṃ brūmaḥ, api tu tādṛkkramayogitāmātram
GSP29vnyps32u:99: sarvatra vākyeṣu yatheṣṭakramakalpane puruṣasya svātantryoktiḥ, na
GSP29vnyps32u:101: yadi tvayā ayathāpurapraṇītatvaṃ sādhyeta, tatra yathāpurapraṇayane kamiva
GSP29vnyps32u:102: doṣāmālakṣyaivaṃ viśeṣayasi ? mantrādiṣu kramabhaṅgānupapattiśca kalpāntarepi tacchaktyanapāyādeva, tathātvepi vā yathāpūrvoccāraṇepi
GSP29vnyps32u:104: nyā. pa. śa. 24 tathāpi sargapralayasaṃbhavāt saṃpradāyavicchede
GSP29vnyps32u:107: śaktasyāpi tajjātīyavedāntarakalpane gauravāt, śaktāvapi siddhopajīvanasyāsmadādiṣu dṛṣṭeḥ, eṣāmeva ca mantrāṇāṃ kalpāntarepi mantratvāvirodhāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:108: evaṃ mantranityatve ca tulyanyāyatayā brāhmaṇanityatvasyāpi dustyajatvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:111: “yā brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP29vnyps32u:112: “ “vācāvirūpanityayā”“pūrve pūrvebhyo vaca etadūcuḥ” “ajān ha vai praśnīṃstapasyamānāt brahma svayaṃ bhyabhyānar ṣat ta ṛṣayobhavan
GSP29vnyps32u:122: samudrā api śoṣamupayāsyanti, jalāśayatvāt, palvalavat ityādyanumānataḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:123: iti cenna, keṣāṃ cinnityasaṃsārapakṣe prathamasya hetostathā tatpratipādakairāgamairaṃśato bādhaḥ, tadvahiṣkāre ca anaikāntaḥ; sarveṣāṃ ca śrutiśatasiddhairnityavibhūtiniṣṭhairīśvaranityavigrahādibhistaistairanekāntaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:127: nyā. pa. śa. 25 vipakṣe bādhakaṃ na samyagdṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:131: uktaṃ ca prajñāparitrāṇe--- “vedataḥ pauruṣeyatvaśaṅkā vede na śāmyati /
GSP29vnyps32u:136: vedārtho naiva śakyeta boddhuṃ tasyeti cenna tat //
GSP29vnyps32u:156: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā vyāsena--- “yugāntentarhitān vedān setihāsān maharṣayaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:162: tadvidāṃ smṛtiśīle ca sādhvācāraṃ manaḥpriyam” // iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:166: idaṃ ca sarvaṃ prasādhitaṃ prajñāparitrāṇe--- “yādṛkprabhāvāḥ śrūyante ṛṣyādyā vedarāśiṣu
GSP29vnyps32u:167: tādṛśā eva sṛjyante vedān dṛṣṭvā svayaṃbhuvā //
GSP29vnyps32u:177: prakṛṣṭaṃ vā pravacanaṃ tatsiddhā vedanityatā” // iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:179: nyā. pa. śa. 27 varṇānityatvaṃ kramānityatā vā
GSP29vnyps32u:181: na ca varṇanityatvaṃ vedanityatvahetuḥ, kāvyādiṣvapi tulyatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:183: śārīrakadevatānadhikaraṇe ca--- “śabda iti cenna, ataḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām /
GSP29vnyps32u:185: samānanāmarūpatvācca, āvṛttāvapyavirodho darśanāt, smṛteśca” iti sūtrairidaṃ sarvaṃ samarthitam
GSP29vnyps32u:186: nyā. pa. śa. 28 vedārthasaṅgahe tu---vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ cet,
GSP29vnyps32u:188: prāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānām 'autpattikastu śabdasyārtthena saṃbandhaḥ' ityuktam”
GSP29vnyps32u:190: tata eva śabdānumānavivekaḥ pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyādivibhāgādikaṃ ca vyaktaṃ pradarśitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:191: tathāhi---yathā agnijalādīnāmauṣṇyādiśaktiyogaḥ svābhāvikaḥ; yathā cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ buddhijanakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī, tathā śabdasyāpi bodhakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
GSP29vnyps32u:192: na ca hastaceṣṭādivat saṅketamūlaṃ śabdasya bodhakatvamiti vaktuṃ yuktam,
GSP29vnyps32u:194: yāni saṅketamūlāni, tāni sarvāṇi sākṣādvā paramparayā vā vijñāyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:195: na ca devadattādiśabdavat kalpayituṃ yuktam; teṣu sākṣādvā paramparayāṃ vā saṃketo jñāyate
GSP29vnyps32u:196: gavādiśabdānāṃ tu anādyamusandhānāvicchedepi saṃketājñānādeva bodhakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī
GSP29vnyps32u:198: nyā. pa. śa. 29 nanu ca indriyavacchabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ cet,
GSP29vnyps32u:199: saṃbandhagrahaṃ bodhakatvāya kimityapekṣate ?; liṅgavadityucyate; yathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaṃ dhūmādi agnyādibuddhijanakam, tathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaḥ śabdopyarthaviśeṣabuddhijanakaḥ evaṃ tarhi śabdopyarthaviśeṣasya liṅgamityanumānameva syāt; maivam;
GSP29vnyps32u:201: dhūmādīnāṃ tu saṃbandhāntaramiti, tasya saṃbandhasya jñāpanadvāreṇa
GSP29vnyps32u:203: evaṃ gṛhītasaṃbandhasya bodhakatvadarśanādanādyanusaṃdhānāvicchedepi saṃṅketājñānāt bodhakatvavaṃ śaktireveti niścīyate //
GSP29vnyps32u:204: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānāmuccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakaḥ, te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdāḥ ityucyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:207: etadeva vedānāmapauruṣeyatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca, yat pūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryatvam /
GSP29vnyps32u:208: tenānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa tameva saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedena bhinnāḥ anantaśākhā vartanta iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:215: “vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhante” ityādayastu mantrā api vidhiparā eva mīmāṃsitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:222: ye tu saptakoṭayo mahāmantrāḥ ityāptaśāstrapratiṣṭhitāḥ, te tu praṇavayogāyogādibhirvaidikāḥ tāntrikāḥ iti vibhajyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:225: sarveṣāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ sadvārakamadvārakaṃ ca paramātmaiva pratipādyaḥ phalapradaśca /
GSP29vnyps32u:230: so 'pi pratyakṣādyaviruddhe svārthe pramāṇam, svataḥ prāmāṇyasyānapāyāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:232: sa ca kvācid vidhyekavākyatayā pramāṇībhavatītyarthavādādhikaraṇādiṣu sthāpitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:233: svataḥ prayojanabhūtārthaviśeṣaviṣayastu svatantratayāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnotīti samanvayasūtrasiddham
GSP29vnyps32u:240: nyā. pa. śa. 32 hitānuśāsanarūpaṃ vākyamiha vidhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:243: tatraivaṃ vivekaḥ--- aprāptasya vidhau prāptirniyame prāptapūraṇam /
GSP29vnyps32u:245: nyā. pa. śa. 33 athātra ko nāma liṅādipratyayārthaḥ ? na tāvadapūrvam,
GSP29vnyps32u:246: tasmin pramāṇāntarāgocare vyutpattyayogāt, tadgocaratve tu apūrvatvavyāghātāt, liṅādibodhite vyutpattāvitaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:249: abhidhānānyathākaraṇāyogāt, prathamavyutpatterapi sarvatra kārya eveti niyamābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:250: tathā---gāmānayetyādiprayojakavṛddhavākyaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ gavānayane pravṛttaṃ puruṣamālokya pārśvastho vyutpitsuścetanapravṛtteḥ kāryatābuddhipūrvakatvāt prayojyavṛddhakāryatābuddheśca kāraṇāntarādarśanāt yadanantaraṃ yat dṛśyate tattasya kāraṇamiti
GSP29vnyps32u:252: tathā kasyacit 'putraste jātaḥ' iti kenacidukte pratipannaputrotpattestasya priyatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:253: vyutpitsuḥ putrajanmavākyaśrāviṇaḥ puruṣasya mukhavikāsamālokya tasya priyārthapratiprattinimittatvānumānāt tatpratīteśca kāraṇāntarādarśanāt putrajanamavākyameva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati /
GSP29vnyps32u:254: na ca putrajanmanaḥ priyatvaṃ bālenājñātamiti vācyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:257: nyā. pa. śa. 34 tataśca ye bālānāṃ priyatvena saṃpratipannā bhakṣyabhojyādayaḥ, taddarśī vyutpitsustatsaṃpattiśrāviṇaḥ puruṣasya
GSP29vnyps32u:259: priyāntarasmṛtyādibhirapi mukhe vikāsaḥ saṃbhavatīti cet, tathaiva svayaṃ tadadhīnaprayojanāntarasmaraṇādināpi gavānayanakartavyatābodhaḥ saṃbhavet
GSP29vnyps32u:261: tathāpi tattatpriyānubandhisulagnajanmasukhaprasavasvāduvāktvādiharṣahetvarthāntarasaṃbhāvanayā viśeṣo durniścayaḥ iti cenna, gavānayanepi vatsasaṃyojanakṣīrasaṃpādanādikartavyatābodhakepi vākye
GSP29vnyps32u:264: tadevaṃ putrajanmavākyodāharaṇasamīkārasya mandamatīnāṃ durārohatvāt tadupekṣaṇena spaṣṭataravyutpattiprakāro yādṛcchiko buddhipūrvaśca bhāṣyakārairdarśitaḥ; tadatra likhyate--- “evaṃ kila bālāḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhamavadhārayanti; mātāpitṛprabhṛtibhirambātātamātulādīn śaśipaśunaramṛgapakṣisarīsṛpādīṃśca enamavehi, imaṃ cāvadhāraya,
GSP29vnyps32u:265: ityabhiprāyeṇāṅgulyā nirdiśya nirdiśya taistaiḥ śabdaisteṣu teṣu bahuśaḥ śikṣitāḥ śanaiḥ śanaistaireva śabdaisteṣu teṣvartheṣu svātmanāṃ budhdyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhāntarādarśanāt saṅketayitṛpuruṣājñānācca teṣvartheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogo bodhakatvanibandhana iti niścinvanti punaśca vyutpannetaraśabdeṣvasya śabdasyāyamartha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitāḥ sarvaśabdānāmarthamavagamya parapratyāyanāya tattadarthāvabodhi vākyajātaṃ prayuñjate /
GSP29vnyps32u:266: prakārāntareṇāpi śabdārthasaṃbandhāvadhāraṇaṃ suśakam---kenacit puruṣeṇa hastaceṣṭādinā 'pitā te sukhamāste, iti devadattāya jñāpaya'” iti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravaṛttaḥ 'pitā te sukhamāste' iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte;
GSP29vnyps32u:267: pārśvasthonyo vyutpitsurmūkavacceṣṭāviśeṣajñaḥ tajjñāpane pravṛttamimaṃ jñātvānugataḥ tajjñāpanāya prayuktamimaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā, ayaṃ śabdastadarthabuddhiheturiti niścinotīti kāryārtha eva vyutpattiriti
GSP29vnyps32u:269: nyā. pa. śa 35 atra pitā te sukhamāsta iti vākyasya sthāne apavarake daṇḍaḥ sthitaḥ ityudāharaṇāntaramātramanyatroktam
GSP29vnyps32u:271: bhavatu vā prathamavyutpattiḥ kārya eva, tathāpi prayogānvayavyatirekavaśādeva śabdaśaktirvivecanīyā
GSP29vnyps32u:272: prayujyante ca siddhaparā evāvivakṣitakartavyaiḥ śabdāḥ; yathā--- kosau rājā ? kauravaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:273: kautukamātrādeva hyatra praśnaḥ, prativacanaṃ ca tadanuvidhāyyeva /
GSP29vnyps32u:274: ato yathā padānāṃ prātisvikī śaktiḥ siddhe kāryepīti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ niṣkṛṣyate, tathā tātparyamapi, yathāyogameva vyutpattyupāyatvepi ca
GSP29vnyps32u:279: ataḥ sukhe duḥkhanivṛttau vā sākṣāt kāryatvabodhaḥ; tadarthatayā tatsādhane /
GSP29vnyps32u:281: na ca sukhāditvamapūrvasya; na ca tatsādhanatayā
GSP29vnyps32u:283: abhyupagamepi laukikasevyaprītyeva devatāprītyaiva śrutyādisiddhayā kālāntarabhāviphalasiddhauliṅvācyatayā svarūpeṇa vā tatkalpanāyogāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:285: pratiṣṭhādeśaviśeṣaśatayātanāsādhanatvaghṛtāñjanacchāgādiparigrahavat vidhyapekṣitaṃ pratītaṃ ca devatāprītyātmakamevāpūrvaṃ liṅvācyatayā svarūpeṇa vā dvāramupakalpyatām; kimanyena ? //
GSP29vnyps32u:286: nyā. pa. śa. 36 yacca jalpantyardhalokāyatikāḥ--- “vigraho havirādānaṃ yugapat karmasannidhiḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:287: prītiḥ phalapradānaṃ ca devatānāṃ na vidyate” //
GSP29vnyps32u:288: iti, tadapi jaiminihṛdayānabhijñatānibandhanam; na hi svataḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:292: stutyā vidhiśeṣabhūteṣvapyarthavādeṣu tadarthatayaiva svārthamabhidadhāneṣu na vākyabhedādidoṣaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:294: svārthaprahāṇāyogāt; na ca sarvā stutirayathārthā; na cāsatā guṇena
GSP29vnyps32u:298: na copacchandanamātratā, tajjñāne puṃsaḥ pravṛttyanupakārāt, nirūpakasya ca tadajñānāyogāt, anyathā bhrāntimūlapravṛttitvaprasaṅgāt;
GSP29vnyps32u:301: nyā. pa. śa. 37 nanvarthavādādhikaraṇe “vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ” iti sarveṣāmarthavādānāṃ vidhyekavākyatvamuktam; samanvayasūtre tu kathaṃ tadviruddhoktiḥ ? maivam;
GSP29vnyps32u:303: vidhyekavākyatve brahmasvarūpatātparyābhāvapūrvapakṣastu apavarakanidhisadbhāvādivākyavat svataḥprayojanabhūtārthaviṣayavākyānāṃ bhinnavākyatayāpi prāmāṇyamupapādya samanvayasūtre pratikṣipyata iti virodhābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:304: api cautsargiṅkamāpavādikañca taṃ tamarthaṃ pratipādayatsu vākyeṣu viṣayavyavasthayā virodhaśamanaṃ vyākaraṇādiṣvapi dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP29vnyps32u:305: ata eva brāhmaṇaśeṣā arthavādā ityārṣamapi vākyamautsargikaviṣayamavagantavyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:306: yā tu śabdabhāvanaiva liṅādyartha iti kaumārilakusṛtiḥ, sā tu pratītiviṃsavādādipratihatā; na hi vidhivākyaśrāvī puruṣaḥ, liṅādi
GSP29vnyps32u:308: na ca yāgādisvarūpe liṅādivyāpāre ca kenacid vākyena samuccitya pratipāditepi kaścit pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:309: liṅādeśca jñāyamānatvalakṣaṇavyāpāramātrācchaktilakṣaṇavyāpārādvā pravartakatve vyutpatteḥ prāgapi tataḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ; vyutpatterapi sahakāritve tatsāpekṣāyā nirviṣayāyāstasyā asaṃbhavāt tadviṣayo vācyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:310: na ca svavyāpāre liṅādiḥ kvacid vyutpannaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:311: sarveṣāmapi śabdānāṃ svavyāpārātirikta eva hyarthe vyutpatti /
GSP29vnyps32u:312: ye cābhidhādayaḥ śabdāḥ, tepi na śṛṅgagrāhikayā svavyāpāramabhidadhati;
GSP29vnyps32u:313: api tu śabdamātravyāpāre tatpravṛtteḥ sāmānyopādhikroḍīkāreṇa svavyāpārasyāpi niveśaḥ; ata evābhidhādiśabdābhidheyasya nimittasya ca sāmānyataḥ pratipannatvād vyutpattyupapattiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:314: liṅādestu svavyāpāre pratīte tatra vyutpattiḥ syāt; tatpratītirvyutpannena
GSP29vnyps32u:315: cet, anyonyāśrayaḥ; avyutpannena cet, atiprasaṅgaḥ, iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:316: na ceṣṭasādhanatvamātraṃ liṅādibodhyam, 'taveṣṭa sādhanamidam, ateḥ kuru'
GSP29vnyps32u:320: 'kartavyamidam, ataḥ kuru ityapi dṛśyate, iti cenna, brāhmaṇasya
GSP29vnyps32u:323: ata eva āptasya vakturicchāmātraṃ liṅādyarthaḥ, iti pratyuktam;
GSP29vnyps32u:324: āptasyeṣṭamidam, atā mamedaṃ kāryam iti pravartamānapuruṣābhilāpaviśeṣadarśanāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:325: na ca liṅārthatvādeva nimantraṇādivad vidhirapi vaktrabhiprāyamātramiti
GSP29vnyps32u:328: yadyapi paramate hyudayanoktā niṣedhānupapattiḥ, tathāpi na sāsmatpakṣamavagāhate, kartavyatāyā vidhyarthatve na kartavya iti nañanvayāvirodhāt; kartṛvyāpārasādhyatvameva ca kartavyatvam; tathāhi vedārthasaṅgahe “liṅādeḥ koyamarthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ”' iti praśnapūrvakaṃ pratyuktam--- “yaja devapūjāyām, iti devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vyutpattisiddhāṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:329: liṅādayobhidadhatīti na kiñcidanupapannam, kartṛvācināṃ pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasaṃbandhaprakāro hi vācyaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:330: bhūtavartamānatādimanye vadanti, liṅādayastu kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vadanti” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:331: bhāṣye cādyasūtre---”ato vidhivākyeṣvapi dhātvarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāmātraṃ śabdānuśāsanasiddhameva liṅādervācyamityadhyavasīyate, dhātvarthasya ca yāgāderagnyādidevatāntaryāmiparamapuruṣasamārādhanarūpatā, samārādhitāt paramapuruṣāt phalasiddhiśceti 'phalamata upapatteḥ' iti pratipādayiṣyate” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:335: yathoktaṃ dīpe kartradhikaraṇai--- “yajeta, upāsīta, iti hi kartari
GSP29vnyps32u:336: lakāraḥ, ataḥ kartārameva bodhayati śāstram” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:337: uktaṃ ca vedārthasaṃgrahepi-- “svargakāmo yajeta, ityevamādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpakāṇāṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:339: yadyapi dīpagranthaḥ puṃsaḥ kartṛtvaṃ śrutisiddhamityatraiva tatparaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:340: tathāpi dhātvarthasādhyatāparaliṅādiṣvapi kartapradhānatayā vṛttiṃ pradarśya sāṃravyān pratikṣipatīti tādarthyāt tatrāpi tatparatvameva grāhyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:341: pacatītyādau pākaṃ karotītyādinipuṇavyākriyāśca kṛtikarmatayaiva dhātvarthasyānvayaṃ vyañjayanti
GSP29vnyps32u:342: nyā. pa. śa. 38 śrīgītābhāṣye caitad vyañjitam--- 'yudhyasva' ityatra
GSP29vnyps32u:344: vyākaraṇāt karaṇatayā ca dhātvarthasyānvaye kathaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇasya karmavibhaktyantatā ? na hi viśeṣyeṇa viśeṣaṇaṃ bhāvayedityanveti,
GSP29vnyps32u:345: phalasyāpūrvasya vā bhavadbhirbhāvyatvābhyupagamāt; vartamānavyapadeśādiṣu ca sādhyāntarābhāvepi na viśeṣaṇamātraṃ sādhyam, na ca prathamāntaṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:348: na cākarmavibhaktyantena dhātunā karmavibhaktyantasya kathaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti vācyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:350: karmatvenānvaye kaściddoṣo dṛśyate, priyaṅgukāmaḥ kṛṣiṃ kuryāditivat
GSP29vnyps32u:352: tadvadevārthatastasya tadupāyatvasiddheḥ keneti karaṇākāṅkṣāyā api śamanāt
GSP29vnyps32u:353: nāmadheyagatatṛtīyānvayopi nāvaśyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena, tattannāmakaiḥ karmaviśeṣaiḥ devatāpūjāṃ kuryādityevaṃparatvepi svarasānvayāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:355: cāṭuvādena rājānaṃ prīṇayeditivād yāgaṃ kuruṣvetyādau na kṛñarthasyāpi
GSP29vnyps32u:359: tatrāpi yadā karmatāṃ vivakṣati, tadāpi kartṛvyāpārāntaramabhipretya vā,
GSP29vnyps32u:361: na ca tāvatānavasthā, pratītyanāroheṇa vyavahārasya paryavasitatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:363: ataḥ, kiṃ, kena, kathamiti bhavatproktavat, kimarthaṃ, kiṃ, kena,
GSP29vnyps32u:364: kathamityākāṅkṣācatuṣṭaye svargādinā kimarthamityākāṅkṣāpūraṇam, devatāṃ prīṇayediti kimityākāṅkṣānaśāntiḥ, jyotiṣṭomenetyādināmadheyādibhiḥ kenetyākāṅkṣā pūryate, kathamityākāṅkṣāpūraṇaṃ tu bhavatāmasmākaṃ ca tulyameveti śābdoyaṃ panthāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:365: atastattadadhikāriṇaḥ svasādhyadhātvarthaviśiṣṭatābodhini yajetetyādau tattaddhātvarthānuṣṭhāne phalam ananuṣṭhāne pratyavāyaśca sarvapraśāsituḥ saṅkalpād bhavatītyapi vākyādavagatam /
GSP29vnyps32u:366: avāntaradevatābuddhivṛttiviśeṣastu sadvārakayajate śrāddhabhojipuruṣaprītyādivadānuṣaṅgikaḥ, anyathā kalpāntarādiṣu pralīnaprācīnadevatāgaṇeṣu pūrvakalpānuṣṭhitakarmaphalānutpattiprasaṅgāt ata eva hyekasyaiva śrutirājñā; anyeṣāṃ cārādhakatvavadārādhyatvamapi tadāyattamiti /
GSP29vnyps32u:370: atra ca “svaśāsanāvabodhi śāstraṃ ca pradiśya” iti bhāṣyamabhisaṃhitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:373: ājñācchedī mama drohī madbhaktopi na vaiṣṇavaḥ” // iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:378: pitṛsura- prasādo vā kartuḥ phalada iti raṅgeśa kudṛśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:382: sarvā yasya samastaśāsituraho śrīraṅgarājasya te rakṣākūtanivedinī śrutirapi tvannityaśāstistataḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:385: jñātvā kāruṇyāt svabhāvācchraddhayait vidvān karmadakṣaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:386: anantaraṃ cāyamevārtho bhagavadgītāyāmapi darśitaḥ--- “ye me matamidaṃ nityamanutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:390: iti svājñānuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindan punarapi svajñānupālanamakurvatāmāsuraprakṛtyantarbhāvamabhidhāyādhamā gatiścoktetir idṛśa eva vidhiśabdārtho vedāntibhiḥ svīkṛtaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:392: ato mūlaskandhīkṛtaniyogaṃ dhātvarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatvaṃ vā nirviṣayapreraṇāsaṃbhavāt tatsādhyatvaparyantaṃ preṣaṇameva vā
GSP29vnyps32u:393: liṅādyasādhāraṇārthaḥ, iti sthite “vidhinimantraṇāmantraṇādhīṣṭasaṃpraśnaprārthaneṣu liṅ” iti samabhivyāhṛtanimantraṇādisamānayogakṣematayā vidhiśabdārthatayā
GSP29vnyps32u:396: nyā. pa. śa. 39 idaṃ ca vidhivākyānāmīśvaraśāsanātmakatvaṃ jaiminināpi
GSP29vnyps32u:398: codanāśabdo hi codakaṃ kañcit puruṣaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29vnyps32u:399: ahṛdayādapi śābarodāharaṇādidaṃ vyajyate--- “ācāryacoditaḥ karomīti hi dṛśyate” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:400: nyā. pa. śa. 40 evaṃ codanāśabdasūcitaśca puruṣaḥ svavākyena prāgeva viśeṣato darśitaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:403: “tatpramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasya” iti sūtrakhaṇḍe ca svasya svācāryabhūtabādarāyaṇasamānābhiprāyatvaṃ vyañjitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:404: sa ca bādarāyaṇo jaiminiṃ svaśiṣyamabhyupagateśvarāditattvaṃ “sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ” ityādiṣu bahuṣu sūtreṣvadarśayat /
GSP29vnyps32u:405: pratikṣepastu kvācitkaḥ anyaparoktyāpātapratītārthamandamatimohanirāsārtho vā kṣudrapramādamātrasyāpyuddhārārtho veti na pradhānavirodhakalpanaliṅgam /
GSP29vnyps32u:406: arthavādādhikaraṇe ca “vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ”
GSP29vnyps32u:407: iti preraṇarūpavidhipratipādakaliṅādyavayavadvārā samudāyabhūtaṃ vidhyuddeśavākyaṃ lakṣayitvā tadekavākyatvamarthavādānāṃ vadan kṛtsnasya vedasyeśvarājñārūpavidhipratipādakatvaṃ tadvākyakaṇṭhoktamasūcayat evamanyatrāpi bhāvyam //
GSP29vnyps32u:408: nyā. pa. śa. 41 evaṃ śrutistāvadīśvarājñā, tadanuvidhānāt smṛtirapi /
GSP29vnyps32u:409: brāhmaṇamantrārthavādamayā hyanantā vedāḥ saṅkīrṇā vikīrṇāḥ kvacit kadācidutsannāśca /
GSP29vnyps32u:415: tattvaviṣanaye tu virodhe bādha eva, ānyaparyaṃvā, vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:417: na ca kvacit smṛtīnāmaprāmāṇye sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ, bādhakādarśanāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:418: kāraṇadoṣakḷpteśca niyataliṅgābhāvāt, saṃvādabhūyastvādibhiḥ parigrahānyathānupapattyā ca śrutereva mūlatvakalpanopapatteḥ; anyathā pauruṣeyavākyasya sarvasyāprāmāṇyaprasaṅge vilīnamāgamena na caitannāniṣṭamiti vaktuṃ śakyam, pitrādyāptavākyaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya cāvārkasya pravṛttidarśanāt
GSP29vnyps32u:422: yogajasākṣātkāramūlatvakḷptirapi vedāviruddhasthale syāt; na ca tatrāpi
GSP29vnyps32u:428: nyā. pa. śa. 42 yānipunaḥ sāṃkhyayogapāśupatapañcarātrāṇi, tānyapi dharmaśāstrabhedā eva;pariśuddhātmacintanarūpajñānayogapradarśanādhikṛtaṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:433: parasparavirodhe tu vedānusāreṇa balābalavyavasthā, vedaviruddhe tvaṃśe bādhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:436: bhagavataiva--- “tvaṃ hi rudrapa mahābāho mohaśāstrāṇi kāraya /
GSP29vnyps32u:438: ahaṃ mohaṃ kariṣyāmi yo manaṃ mohayiṣyati /
GSP29vnyps32u:441: yacceśvaramabhyupagamya kevalanimittakāraṇatvapratiphalanakalpaiśvaryavarṇanaṃ yoge, yacca pāśupate parāvaratattvavyatyayavedaviruddhācārādikalpanam, tat sarvaṃ vyapohya śiṣṭe ḥṃśe prāmāṇyaṃ grāhyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:444: pañcarātraṃ tu kṛtsnaṃ śrutivat smṛtivadvā pramāṇam,
GSP29vnyps32u:446: mahābhārate ca āptatama mānavadharmaśāstrasyāpi tanmūlatvokteratyādareṇa vyāsadiparigrahaviśeṣādīśvaradayāmūlatvena ca kāraṇadoṣaprasaṅgābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:451: na ca vipralambhārthaṃ tathā nibandhaḥ, anyatrāpi prasaṅgāt;”adhītā
GSP29vnyps32u:454: “saṅkarṣaṇo nāma jīvo jāyata” ityādestvavatārādigocaratvasya tatraiva siddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:455: śarīrake ca--- “utpattyasaṃbhavāt”“na ca kartuḥ karaṇam” iti sūtradvayena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā “vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ” “vipratiṣedhācca”
GSP29vnyps32u:457: tathā nirmūlatvāsatparigrahasatparigrahābhāvavaudikasaṃskāravarjanāvaidikasaṃskāravidhānavidyāsthānaparigaṇanābhāvakṣudravidyābāhulyādimandaśaṅkānāṃ bhagavadyāmunamunibhiḥ parihāraḥ prapañcitaḥ iti neha pratanyate //
GSP29vnyps32u:464: nyā. pa. śa. 44 tata eva caiṣāṃ viprakīrṇaśākhāmūlatvaṃ siddhāntaḥ, ityapi sūcitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:465: kvacit kadācit keṣāñcicchākhāviśeṣāṇāmucchedaḥ; te ca punarvyāsādibhiḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:469: manvādivacanaprāmāṇyaṃ nyāyamantareṇāpi śrutyaiva siddham--- “yadvai kiñca manuravadat tadbheṣajam” ityādibhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:470: evaṃ śiṣṭācārasyāpi--- “yathā te tatra varteran, tathā tratra vartarthoḥ”
GSP29vnyps32u:474: śrutyaiva dharmanirṇaye saṃbhavati kiṃ dharmaśāstreṇa ? ityāśaṅkyāha marīciḥ --- “durbodhā vaudikāḥ śabdāḥ prakīrṇatvācca ye khilāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:476: iti satyapi dharmaśāstre gṛhyāpekṣāṃ darśayati devalaḥ--- “manvādayaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:482: bhagavaddharmaśāstrasya tu pañcarātrasya śrutyādivirodhe ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāderiva deśakālādhikāryavasthāviśeṣaviṣayatayā vikalpa eva,
GSP29vnyps32u:485: sāṃkhyaṃ sayogaṃ sapaśupatimataṃ kutracit pañcarātraṃ sarvatraiva pramāṇaṃ tadidamavagataṃ pañcamādeva vedāt” // iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:487: anyatra ca--- upaniṣadi tu bahvyāṃ vyāvaghoṣyāmadoṣa-
GSP29vnyps32u:489: śrutirapi tadupajñaiḥ pañcarātrairvikalpaṃ na labhata iti sūktaṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:496: “ ityādi vacanaṃ tu trayyantamūlatayā ekāyanaśrutimūlatayā ca yojyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:497: na cātra vedatve sandegdhavyam, “yaṃ vākeṣvanuvākeṣu niṣatsūpaniṣatsu ca /
GSP29vnyps32u:507: tatrāpyajñānamevāparādhyati, na punarāyuṣmato doṣaḥ; yata ete vaṃśaparamparayā vājasaneyaśākhāmadhīyānāḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:510: tepi svaśākhāgṛhyoktadharmaṃ yathāvadanutiṣṭhamānā na śākhāntarīyakarmānanuṣṭhānāt brāhmaṇyāt pracyavante, anyeṣāmapi
GSP29vnyps32u:511: parasparaśākhāvihitakarmānanuṣṭhānanimittābrāhmaṇyaprasaṅgāt; sarvatra hi jāticaraṇagotrādhikārādivyavasthitā eva samayācārā upalabhyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:512: yadyapi sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ karma, tathāpi na parasparavilakṣaṇādhikārisambaddhā dharmāḥ kvacit, samuccīyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:513: vilakṣaṇāstrayīvihitasvargaputrādiviṣayopabhogasādhanaindrāgneyādikarmādhikāribhyo dvijebhyastrayyantaikāyanaśrutivihitavijñānābhigamanopādānejyāprabhṛtibhagavatprāptyekopāyakarmādhikāriṇo mumukṣavo brāhmaṇāḥ, iti nobhayeṣāmapyanyonyaśākhāvihitakarmānanuṣṭhānamabrāhmaṇyamāpādayati yathā ca ekāyanaśākhāyā apauruṣeyatvam, tathā kāśmīrāgamaprāmaṇyaṃ eva
GSP29vnyps32u:515: prakṛtānāṃ tu bhāgavatānāṃ sāvitryanuvacanāditrayīsambandhasya sphuṭataramu palabdhirna tattyāganimittavrātyatvādisandehaṃ sahate” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:516: nyā. pa. śa. 45 caturvidhaṃ cedaṃ pañcarātram--- āgamasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:518: caturvidhaṃ cedaṃ vedamūlabhūtāṃśasya upabṛṃhaṇam; tadabhiprāyeṇa hyuktaṃ mahābhārate--- “mahato vedavṛkṣasya mūlabhūto mahānayam /
GSP29vnyps32u:520: caturṇāṃ caiṣāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrīpauṣkarādiṣu bhagavataiva darśitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:523: sarvaparāmarśena sādhitamasmābhiriti tatraiva tadvistaraḥ sāttvatadharmagopturananyairanusandheya iti nātra prabrūmaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:524: evaṃ sthite kecid bāhlīkaprāyāḥ āgamabāhyāḥ śrīmadvaikhānasaprāmāṇye viśerate /
GSP29vnyps32u:525: tatra tāvat kalpasūtraṃ nāpramāṇam, itaravadeva kalpasūtratvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:527: vaidikamantraireva sakaladharmavidhānāt, sūtrāntarāṇāmapi kuṇḍasanniveśalakṣaṇādiṣu kvacit kvacit tadupajīvanāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:528: varṇāśramadharmāṇāmanukūlaṃ nārāyaṇaparatvapratipādanāderapi sattvamūlatvena prāmāṇyaikahetutvāt, “harimeva smarennityaṃ karmapūrvāpareṣvapi /
GSP29vnyps32u:530: ityādinā śaunakādibhirapi tathaiva vidhānāt, vaṃśaparamparayā ca vaikhānasairadhīyamānatayā viplavasyāpyanavakāśatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:531: astu kimapi tat, idaṃ taditi kiṃ niyākamamiti cet, itarānupalamaḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:532: tadupalambhaśca, anyathā sarvatra śrutismṛtyādīnāṃ tathā tathā saṃśayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:533: astvidameva tat, pramāṇaṃ ca, tathāpi bhārgavādicatuṣkasya kathaṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:534: prāmāṇyam ? iti cenna, uktottaratvāt, maharṣipraṇītatvavedāviruddhatvādeḥ samatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:539: dvayorapi parasparaprāmāṇyam “viṣṇostantraṃ dvidhā proktam” ityādiṣu vyañjitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:540: parasparākṣepavacanāni tu ikṣubhakṣakṛticikīrṣubhirasahiṣṇubhirupakṣiptāni vā svaśāstrapraśaṃsārthavādarūpāṇi veti na tato virodhaḥ //
GSP29vnyps32u:541: nyā. pa. śa. 46 nanu bhārgavādīni na tāvat kalpasūtrāṇi,
GSP29vnyps32u:543: na smṛtyantarāṇi, manvādiṣvapāṭhāt tadvat tatprasiddhyabhāvāccāna ca
GSP29vnyps32u:549: smṛtyantareṣu devotsavādiprapañcanaṃ nāstīti cet, mā bhūt prapañcanam,
GSP29vnyps32u:551: tathāpi jīvānāmantatonyonyavaiṣamyamātrasya ca sārvatrikatvānnikṛṣṭādhikārikāṇi tānīti cenna, teṣvanyeṣu ca brāhmaṇyaikapradhānatvavacatāt, tathopalabdheśca /
GSP29vnyps32u:552: kathaṃ teṣāṃ brāhmaṇyamiti cet, śāntaṃ pāpam /
GSP29vnyps32u:555: dṛśyante hyete vaṃśaparamparayā vedamadhīyānā vekhānasasūtroktavaidikasakalasaṃskāraśālino varṇāśramadharmakarmaṭhā bhagavadekāntā brāhmaṇāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:556: nūnamamīṣāṃ brāhmaṇyaikakāraṇena bhāgavatatvenaiva viparītaṃ bambhramīti brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ; anyathā vaikhānasakalpasyāpi niradhikāritvenāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:557: astu tatprāmāṇyam; santu ca deśāntare kālāntare vā tadadhikāriṇaḥ; amī tu katame ? iti cet, deśāntarādāvapyevaṃ vaktuṃ śakyatvāt; viparītaṃ vā kasmānna syāt ?; evaṃ ca sati sūtrāntarādiṣvapi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps32u:559: āptagranthasthatādṛśavacanābhāvāt; bhāvepyeteṣāṃ nikṛṣṭajātitve pramāṇābhāvāt; āgamaprāmāṇyoktasātvatādisamākhyānirvāhasamatvāt; na hyanekārthaḥ śabdo nāsti, na ca śabdaikyādarthaikyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:560: śabdabhedenārthabhedo vā; anyathā vilīnaṃ tṛtīyāśrameṇāpi; vivādasya tubhavādṛśajihvāspandamātrādhīnasya sūtragotrādāvapi suśakatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:561: itaḥ pūrvaṃ tāvannāstīti cenna, asyāpi vivādasyānāditvāyogāt, tataḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:562: pūrvamabhāvāta; tathā ca bhavato bhaviṣyato vā vivādasya vivādatvāviśeṣāt tataḥ paraṃ teṣāmanāśvāsaprasaṅgāt
GSP29vnyps32u:563: asmākaṃ tāvat teṣu saṃśayo nāstīti cet, asmākaṃ vā kimastyamīṣu ? /
GSP29vnyps32u:568: teṣāṃ keṣāṃ cinnāmasāmyamātrādatrānupraveśaḥ saṃbhavatīti cenna, kasyā api śaṅkāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt; asti ca varṇitvabhikṣutvādīnāṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:573: nāyaṃ lokosti na paro na sukha saṃśayātmanaḥ” // iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:575: tat siddhaṃ viśiṣṭādhikārikaṃ vedāviruddhaṃ vaikhānasādismaraṇaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29vnyps32u:580: “chandaḥ pādau śabdaśāstraṃ na vaktraṃ kalpaḥ pāṇī jyautiṣaṃ cakṣuṣī ca /
GSP29vnyps32u:581: śikṣā ghrāṇaṃ śrotramuktaṃ niruktaṃ vedasyāṅgānyāhuretāni ṣaṭ ca //
GSP29vnyps32u:583: ityārabhya “anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt ityevamantā viṃśatilakṣaṇī mīmāṃsā /
GSP29vnyps32u:586: nyā. pa. śa. 47 tattvaratnākare tvevamuktam--- “karmadevatābrahmagocarā sā tridhodbhabhau sūtrakārataḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:594: “vedārthe nyāyacintye prathamamavasitaṃ karma taddevatā cā- thātaḥ śārīrakāṃśe niravadhikaphalabrahmacintā tvasūtri /
GSP29vnyps32u:595: tatrādhyāye parasmin svayamupaniṣadāmanvayosyāvirodho mokṣopāyotha muktirviṣayaviṣayiṇau siddhasādhyau dvikārthau //
GSP29vnyps32u:602: kramo viṃśatilakṣaṇyā na vaidhaḥ kintu yauktikaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:604: nyā. pa. śa. 48 evaṃ viṃśatilakṣaṇīśravaṇamananābhyāṃ supratiṣṭhitasamastaśāstrārthasya mokṣasādhanatayā vidheyaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ na vākyārthajñānamātram, tasya rāgaprāptaśravaṇādisiddhatvāt ata eva ca tasmin viśeṣe vedanādisāmānyaśabdaparyavasānam /
GSP29vnyps32u:605: na ca nididhyāsanādikaṃ niṣiddham, varaṇīyatvameva vihitamiti vācyam;
GSP29vnyps32u:609: tadeva ca nididhyāsanaṃ prītirūpaṃ prakaraṇaviśeṣāt samādhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:618: iti, tat kośatyāgābhiprāyam; na ca sādarapaṭusaṃskārapracayasaṃsiddhamedhāsaṃpadaḥ puruṣasya kośena kiñcit sāddhyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:621: adhīmahe ca-- “medhāmanīṣe mā viśatāṃ samīcīna bhūtasya
GSP29vnyps32u:623: yaddhā muktaprāyātyantaniṣpannayogapuruṣaviṣayametat; na hi tasya śāstreṇa jñātavyaṃ tadānīmasti, sākṣātkṛtasamastatattvārthatvāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:626: iti, idaṃ tu tīvrasaṃvegināmalasāstikānāṃ ca grāhmam;
GSP29vnyps32u:631: iti, tat śābdaṃ prameyatattvamadhijigamiṣatāṃ pramāṇeṣu sāram, tadabhāve puṃsaḥ paśubhiḥ samatvaprasaṅgāt iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:633: yaḥ sarvatra yathāpuraṃ vitanute nāmāni viśvākṛti- rnityaṃ naḥ pratibhātu
GSP29vnyps32u:635: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntānacāryasya kṛtiṣunyāyapariśuddhau śabdādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam //
